alert.note: Alert for Colquitt (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued December 30 at 3:04PM EST until December 30 at 3:45PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southeastern Colquitt County in south central Georgia... * Until 345 PM EST. * At 304 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Moultrie, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This tornadic thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Colquitt County, including the following locations... Murphy, Spence Airport, Pineboro, South Moultrie, Moultrie Municipal A/P and Ellenton. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
